title: Doomsday Machine
author: johnjones4
content: readme.md doomsday machinedoomsday machine is tool backing cloud services a local machine. syncs content a local directory non-vendor-specific file formats. (whenever possible, opts formats such .html, .csv, etc.) requires mysql database store backup configurations object metadata. configuration data is encrypted rest, metadata is . also, backup archives are encrypted rest, the backup directory is .setupcheckout dependenciescheck the code install dependencies running:# git clone git@github.com:johnjones4/doomsday-machine.git# cd doomsday-machine# npm installenvironment variables are several configurations must set runtime environment variables. should set a .env file. variables are:mysqlmysql_host: location the mysql server.mysql_user: user used connect the mysql server.mysql_password: password used connect the mysql server.mysql_database: schema connect on mysql server.mysql_port: port connect on mysql server. defaults 3306.backupsecret: secret used encode configurations files.working_directory: directory used store working files archives.backup_interval: interval run backup milliseconds. defaults daily.archive_retention: number archives retain following backup.web serverweb_port: port the web server listen connections. defaults 8000.site_url: url the web server redirect from oauth requests. defaults http://localhost:8000.auth_username: username http authentication.auth_password: password http authentication.email alertsmail_host: smtp host connect for sending email alerts.mail_port: smtp port connect for sending email alerts.mail_secure: smtp setting secure connections.mail_username: smtp username connect for sending email alerts.mail_password: smtp password connect for sending email alerts.mail_from: address sending email alerts.mail_to: address sending email alerts.running launch application:# node index.iscreditsicon created arthur shlain the noun project
